title: 88: The Weight-Loss Q & A Episode (February Edition)
itunes:title: The Weight-Loss Q & A Episode (February Edition)
description: In today’s episode, Lisa is answering your weight-loss questions, like how to avoid turning an eating mistake into a whole day fiasco, and how to avoid temptations that seem to be EVERYWHERE. Plus, tips on how to overcome something most of us do: STRESS EATING. So go ahead and push play — and when you’re done, head on over to our Foodcast page for links to the tips mentioned in this episode!
itunes:summary: Weight loss can be challenging, but don’t stress, HG is here to help you navigate through some of the roadblocks ahead!
itunes:author: Lisa Lillien
dc:creator: Lisa Lillien
